para.text: operation consists of these steps: 1) Move the mouse cursor to the screen object representing something to be moved or copied. 2) Hold down the left mouse button while moving the cursor (whose shape usually changes) to the object representing the destination. 3) Finally, release the mouse button. If the CTRL key is held down during steps 2) and 3), it is a copy operation; otherwise, it is a move operation. When applied to project trees, drag-and-drop operations can also be performed with the right mouse button. This invokes a menu of choices (move, copy, etc.) when the button is released.
